sentence: A guy, by the way, who Rep. Paul Gosar calls a friend.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: Matt Salmon blasts Wendy Rogers as unfit to serve. Where you been, Matt?

sentence: Another recent controversy erupted when nine current and former GOP lawmakers—including Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar—appeared at the American First Political Action Conference (AFPAC) led by Nick Fuentes, the notorious leader of the white nationalist Groyper movement.
author: Elad Nehorai
title: The Right’s Selective Outrage on Antisemitism Is a Scam

sentence: In 2019, Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) called Orban a "patriot" who "demonstrates the values of Western civilization and democracy, sovereignty, and self-determination."
author: Emily Singer
title: Greene Praises Authoritarian Orban After Election Win In Hungary

sentence: That’s why they’re coming after me, and they’re coming after Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, they went after Madison [Cawthorn].” And who does Greene believe is behind it?
author: Kristen Doerer
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Says Legal Challenge to Take Her Off the Ballot Is a ‘Globalist’ Ploy for a ‘One World Government’
